acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

business_details.Business: Accused Lalin Singh Basumatary filed a petition praying for passing necessary order in view of the order dated 14-06-19 passed in connection with Criminal Petition No. 152/2019 whereby the charge sheet submitted in connection with Howraghat P.S case No. 28/2018 is quashed. In view of the said order this proceeding is dropped. NBWA issued against the accused person returned unexecuted with a report. Accordingly this case is disposed of.
